name: Name a Planet!
description:
Hey you! Yes you! You look like a good namer! You know, someone who's good at naming things. Well, here's the deal: You come up with name, I come up with a planet! It may not be pretty, but then the name probably wasn't, either.

This toy procedurally generates planets depending on a name you enter.

Mouse Controls:
Click & Hold Right Mouse Button: Rotate View
Mouse Wheel: Zoom
